text: Ana vahe amema'amofo agiama ainireti'ene higoreti'ma eri haviama hu'za tro'ma hu'nagenka'ma ke'nana zamofo agafa'amo'a amanahu hu'ne. Anama refko haza kini vahe'mo'za mofa'nezmi omeri emeri nehu'za, eri mago hunaku hanazanagi, zamagra magopina omanigahaze. Na'ankure ainine higomo'enena ruohamprigaha'e.
